alex: Have you seen the latest viral TikTok trend?
cz_reply: Ano, viděl jsem ten nejnovější virální TikTok trend.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have seen the latest viral TikTok trend.
I have watched the newest viral TikTok trend.

alex: People have been obsessed with short videos recently.
cz_reply: Lidé byli posedlí krátkými videi v poslední době.
accepted_answers: People have been obsessed with short videos recently.
Everyone has loved short videos lately.

alex: Have you posted any reels on Instagram this week?
cz_reply: Ne, tento týden jsem nepřidal žádné reels.
accepted_answers: No, I haven't posted any reels this week.
Yes, I have posted some reels on Instagram this week.

alex: I have noticed that reels get more views than normal posts.
cz_reply: Všiml jsem si, že reels dostávají více zhlédnutí než běžné příspěvky.
accepted_answers: I have noticed that reels get more views than normal posts.
Reels have gotten more views than regular posts.

alex: Have you ever gone viral on any platform?
cz_reply: Ne, nikdy jsem nebyl virální na žádné platformě.
accepted_answers: No, I haven't gone viral on any platform.
Yes, I have gone viral once.

alex: Do you think social media have changed how we communicate?
cz_reply: Ano, sociální sítě změnily způsob, jak komunikujeme.
accepted_answers: Yes, social media have changed how we communicate.
No, social media haven't changed communication that much.

alex: I have used memes to express my mood more than once.
cz_reply: Použil jsem memy k vyjádření nálady více než jednou.
accepted_answers: I have used memes to express my mood more than once.
Yes, I have used memes to show how I feel.
